predicate.note: Frames file for 'view' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 29.2 30.2, other framed members include classify, count, declassify, define, describe, employ, establish, intend, portray, rank, reclassify, recommend, redefine, regard, treat; observe, recognize, scrutinize, study and watch. Whew. Comparison to define and watch.

roleset.name: watch

example.name: somewhat odd
example.text: John views 15 hours of TV every day.

roleset.note: A little learned, but needed for the eventual tagging of deverbal nouns.

example.name: very typical
example.text: Martin Fabi, Innopac's president and chief executive, said Innopac viewed Mr. Pattison's decision to seek control as a ``very positive'' move.
example.arg: Mr. Pattison's decision to seek control

example.name: different kind of attribute
example.text: So [*] view permanent insurance for what it is -- a compromise between pure insurance and direct investment.
example.arg: what it is -- a compromise between pure insurance and direct investment
